description: A representation of a measurement of a real-world concept. This is the fundamental abstraction of a “datum” that retains relationships to a limited number of categories of metadata that apply to any type of environmental data you can define

evaluation-type.description: The name for the specific Evaluation sub-class that inherits properties from the abstract Evaluation

activity.description: The Activity that generated the Evaluation

property.description: The Property evaluated for the Entity subjected to measurement or observation

measurement-context.description: The various Measurement-Contexts that make the data meaningful by providing reference frames for space, time, data quality, etc.

permissions.description: The read/write privileges on the Evaluation granted to various Agents.
